Sentencas: The rapid development of express logistics industry has yielded more carton wastes, how to utilize them as resources has become an important issue in recent years.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, effective and multifunctional applications of waste carton are explored to obtain products of solid carbon fuel and tar via pyrolysis process.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Solid carbon derived from waste carton is utilized as fuel for direct carbon solid oxide fuel cells (DC-SOFCs) with the symmetric perovskite La0.3Sr0.7Fe0.7Ti0.3O3-delta electrodes and scandium stabilized zirconia electrolyte for power generation.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The maximum output performance of this DC-SOFC is up to 307.8 mW cm-2 at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The cell fueled by 0.2 g carbonated waste carton is operated at constant resistance discharging mode of 20 Omega, and 5.8 h discharging with a capacity of 658 C is represented.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Ash of the carton fuel is collected after operation.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Infrared spectrum and surface-enhanced Raman spectrum are employed to characterize tar from pyrolysis, and they show that tar contains many organic matters with a potential to be used as chemical raw materials.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Energy dispersive spectroscopy and X-ray diffraction results show various inorganic salts and oxides in the ash, it means that the ash may be a promising candidate for fertilizer.
Titulo: Efficient use of waste carton for power generation, tar and fertilizer through direct carbon solid oxide fuel cell
